name: Thermophobia
description:
Play as a lil guy trying to find his way through different environments! Try and keep your temperature at the sweet spot so your lil guy doesn't take damage! There also may be some doors that require the right temperature to get through. Submitted for the Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1

Controls: 

W or S = raise or lower temperature 

A or D / Left or right arrows = moving left or right

Spacebar = Jump

Credits:
